segments.text: Hello . Beijing Restaurant . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I want to place an order , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like to order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a menu from your restaurant . I ’ ll order using the number of each meal from your menu .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d like to order number 17 , no . 23 and no . 24 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will you come to pick up your order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll be there in about an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be fine . We ’ ll have your meals ready when you arrive . Thank you for your order .
segments.speaker: S1
